cleaned_text: The first class Hotel Maasberg Therme Medical wellness & Golf resort is situated on the sunny side of Bad Sobernheim, in a lovely area, very calm, near the edge of a forest, close to airport Frankfurt-Hahn (distance 40 km), in middle of the wine producing area of the Nahe, and has an easy and close access to the autobahn (20 Minutes) to the Rhine-valley (Frankfurt, Mainz, Wiesbaden, Heidelberg, Loreley) and railway-station (2 km). In the close forest and nature reserve, there are various, well marked hiking trails. The hotel offers 77 very comfortable, fully equipped rooms and suites, lobby, lift, 2 restaurants, terrace, bar, wine-cellar and conference rooms. In the spacious spa area, there are the indoor pool, the saunas, fitness room, various massages and wellness baths. There, our resident doctor offers medical treatments including nature cure, homoeopathy, acupuncture, traditional Chinese treatments, laser therapy as well as conventional medicine. In the spacious hotel garden with many old trees you find a tennis court, outdoor pool, pitch- and putting green and, only a few meters distance, our private golf-course and driving-range. We look forward to welcome you! Your families Axel Stassen & Claudia Voigt Read more
